What I Do

Build web and mobile applications using frameworks such as React, Angular, Next.js and Ionic

Build performant, modern and clean Javascript or preferably (strongly typed) Typescript code

Implement responsive layouts using CSS, Sass or CSS-in-JS solutions such as Styled Components or Emotion

Translate UI designs built on Figma, Adobe XD and others into fully working prototypes or web/mobile applications

Implement and configure unit tests using JEST and/or React Testing Library and E2E tests with Playwright

Build and customize UI elements with libraries such as Material Design, Kendo and Storybook.

Portfolio

Moztra

|

commercial

A CMS built in Angular 8 that uses Components, Services, Routing, etc. For the back-end I used Google Firebase. It is a commercial project, no Github avaiable.

side project

I rewrote in React/Ionic the same Movieviz app I made in Angular/Ionic.

The app uses Redux for the state management.

commercial

side project

A website about my trip to Patagonia, in special the Map/Gallery page, where I learned a lot about the Google Maps API, a nice way to show the landscape.

side project

Quite a fun project, where I had the chance to learn Paper.js and a path finding library. The "game terrain" can be randomized, give it a try!
